# Importing Data

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

# Loading Libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| message: false
#| echo: true

#all Quebrada
setwd("/courses/EDS214/pr/data/knb_lter_luq_raw")
p_r_m <-read_csv("RioMameyesPuenteRoto.csv", na = c("NA")) %>% clean_names()
b_q_1 <- read_csv("QuebradaCuenca1-Bisley.csv", na = c("NA")) %>% clean_names()  
b_q_2 <- read_csv("QuebradaCuenca2-Bisley.csv", na = c("NA")) %>% clean_names()
b_q_3 <-  read_csv("QuebradaCuenca3-Bisley.csv", na = c("NA")) %>% clean_names()

#Full Join

stream_water_df <- p_r_m %>% 
  full_join(b_q_1) %>% 
  full_join(b_q_2) %>%
  full_join(b_q_3)

setwd("/courses/EDS214/pr/data/processed_data")
write_csv(stream_water_df, "stream_water.csv")

```
